conbody.p: The second step in creating a complex page is to create the module (see section ) using Page Designer. We created the overall design of the module starting from the outside and working inwards using the plan that we developed in the previous step (see section). As horizontal and vertical boxes are added, the overall form of the module beings to take shape.
Using the properties sheet, we added captions to the different boxes, which act as containers for child labels and fields.
Horizontal boxes are added to the interior of these containers for each label and field combination that exists.
